ijp.model

Class HomeLocation

  • java.lang.Object
    • ijp.model.HomeLocation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Location

    public class HomeLocation
extends java.lang.Object
implements Location
    HomeLocation class implements Location interface and contains the implementation of methods that show, which location is the current image shown, depending on the image. It also contains methods to turn right or left and go forward to the next room, while updating the values of room and side of the image shown.
    Version:
    1.0.4, 27 Nov 2015
    Author:
    Konstantinos Zacharis (s1569729@sms.ed.ac.uk)
